title: Blocks modular smartwatch storms past $250,000 Kickstarter goal in less than a day
text:
Blocks modular smartwatch storms past $250,000 Kickstarter goal in less than a day 
Published By: BGR.com - Today 
It all started as an awesome concept, at least on paper, a few years ago: The Blocks modular smartwatch that would let the wearer customize ...
